alert.note: Alert for Hughes; Lyman; Stanley (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 28 at 7:27PM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Stanley, southeastern Hughes and north central Lyman Counties through 900 PM CDT... At 827 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Cedar Creek Rec Area, or 17 miles north of Presho, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Cedar Creek Rec Area around 835 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Degrey Rec Area, Rousseau and Canning. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
